**敏捷手套**（gauntlets of dexterity，有时缩写为**GoD**）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[手套](/wiki/%E6%89%8B%E5%A5%97 "手套")类[防具](/wiki/%E9%98%B2%E5%85%B7 "防具")。它是一种[魔法](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法物品 (page does not exist)")防具，由[皮革](/index.php?title=%E7%9A%AE%E9%9D%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "皮革 (page does not exist)")制成，未[鉴定](/index.php?title=%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鉴定 (page does not exist)")时外观是[随机](/index.php?title=%E9%9A%8F%E6%9C%BA%E5%A4%96%E8%A7%82\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "随机外观 (page does not exist)")的[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)。

[ ]

## 生成

在[星界位面](/index.php?title=%E6%98%9F%E7%95%8C%E4%BD%8D%E9%9D%A2\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "星界位面 (page does not exist)")生成的[玩家怪物](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家怪物 (page does not exist)")若生成时未获得[战锤](/wiki/%E6%88%98%E9%94%A4 "战锤")，则有7⁄8的概率[获得](/index.php?title=%E6%80%AA%E7%89%A9%E8%B5%B7%E5%A7%8B%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "怪物起始物品 (page does not exist)")一双随机手套，该手套有1⁄5的概率是敏捷手套，因此这些玩家怪物生成时有7⁄40（约17.5%）的概率获得敏捷手套[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。

## 描述

敏捷手套的基础[AC](/index.php?title=AC/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "AC/zh-CN (page does not exist)")加成为1，并会根据自身的[附魔](/index.php?title=%E9%99%84%E9%AD%94\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "附魔 (page does not exist)")等级赋予穿戴者等值的[敏捷](/index.php?title=%E6%95%8F%E6%8D%B7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "敏捷 (page does not exist)")修正（最多可以将敏捷提升至25）。穿戴附魔值不为0的敏捷手套会[自动鉴定](/index.php?title=%E8%87%AA%E5%8A%A8%E9%89%B4%E5%AE%9A\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "自动鉴定 (page does not exist)")之。

## 策略

高敏捷值可以增加玩家的攻击和法术命中敌人的概率，不过，能够提升[命中](/index.php?title=%E5%91%BD%E4%B8%AD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "命中 (page does not exist)")的手段很多（例如提升武器[技能](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%80%E8%83%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "技能 (page does not exist)")和[幸运](/index.php?title=%E5%B9%B8%E8%BF%90\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "幸运 (page does not exist)")值）。因此，敏捷手套的使用频率并不高，在[飞升套件](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E5%8D%87%E5%A5%97%E4%BB%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞升套件 (page does not exist)")里用[皮手套](/wiki/%E7%9A%AE%E6%89%8B%E5%A5%97 "皮手套")也足够了。施法玩家可以使用敏捷手套来提升[攻击法术](/index.php?title=%E6%94%BB%E5%87%BB%E6%B3%95%E6%9C%AF\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "攻击法术 (page does not exist)")（例如[魔法飞弹](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E9%A3%9E%E5%BC%B9%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E4%B9%A6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法飞弹魔法书 (page does not exist)")和[死亡一指](/index.php?title=%E6%AD%BB%E4%BA%A1%E4%B8%80%E6%8C%87%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E4%B9%A6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "死亡一指魔法书 (page does not exist)")）的命中率。[僧侣](/index.php?title=%E5%83%A7%E4%BE%A3\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "僧侣 (page does not exist)")也可以用它缓解穿戴[铠甲](/wiki/%E9%93%A0%E7%94%B2 "铠甲")带来的[命中](/index.php?title=%E5%91%BD%E4%B8%AD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "命中 (page does not exist)")惩罚。

该手套也可以增加[投掷](/index.php?title=%E6%8A%95%E6%8E%B7\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "投掷 (page does not exist)")[鸡蛇蛋](/index.php?title=%E9%B8%A1%E8%9B%87%E8%9B%8B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鸡蛇蛋 (page does not exist)")或[麻痹药水](/index.php?title=%E9%BA%BB%E7%97%B9%E8%8D%AF%E6%B0%B4\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "麻痹药水 (page does not exist)")等非武器类物品的命中率，这些道具只能通过提升敏捷增加命中率——然而，即使你的敏捷提升到23点，投掷这些道具仍有约12%的概率不命中。如果你可以接受风险的话，[持握](/index.php?title=%E6%8C%81%E6%8F%A1\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "持握 (page does not exist)")这些道具并近战攻击敌人会更容易生效。

## 历史

敏捷手套最初于[NetHack 3.0.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.0.0 "NetHack 3.0.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Gauntlets_of_dexterity/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

In [SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM"), [upgrading](/wiki/Upgrading "Upgrading") leather gloves has a 1⁄2 chance of producing gauntlets of dexterity, and upgrading gauntlets of dexterity always produces leather gloves.

[The Gauntlets of Defense](/wiki/The_Gauntlets_of_Defense "The Gauntlets of Defense") are a [neutral](/wiki/Neutral "Neutral") pair of [artifact](/wiki/Artifact "Artifact") gauntlets of dexterity that provide [half physical damage](/wiki/Half_physical_damage "Half physical damage") while worn, and can be [invoked](/wiki/Invoked "Invoked") to toggle [invisibility](/wiki/Invisibility "Invisibility").

Dexterity improves your AC at higher values, making gauntlets of dexterity much more attractive to the point that they may feature in ascension kits. It is debatable whether they are worth spending a [wish](/wiki/Wish "Wish") on, since they are much more available through mundane means, especially for [gnomish](/wiki/Gnome_\(starting_race\) "Gnome (starting race)") characters who have the ability to [tinker](/wiki/Tinker "Tinker").

### NetHack brass

In [NetHack brass](/wiki/NetHack_brass "NetHack brass"), gauntlets of dexterity set the wearer's dexterity to their race or role's maximum similar to [gauntlets of power](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_power "Gauntlets of power"), and they will always auto-identify when worn or removed.

### dNetHack

In [dNetHack](/wiki/DNetHack "DNetHack") and [notdNetHack](/wiki/NotdNetHack "NotdNetHack"), gauntlets of dexterity confer 2 base AC, 0 base [DR](/wiki/DR "DR") and add their enchantment to the wearer's dexterity while worn. Both variants also incorporate SLASH'EM-styled bonuses to AC.

Female [droven](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") [Anachrononauts](/wiki/Anachrononaut "Anachrononaut") start with a +1 pair of gauntlets of dexterity.

dNetHack has two pairs of artifact gauntlets of dexterity:

- [The Shield of the Resolute Heart](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#Shield_of_the_Resolute_Heart "DNetHack artifacts"), an unaligned artifact that can be enchanted to +7 - they confer half physical damage when worn, and can be invoked to bless and repair themselves, also raising the enchantment to +3 if it is below that threshold.
- [The Claws of the Revenancer](/wiki/DNetHack_artifacts#The_Claws_of_the_Revenancer "DNetHack artifacts"), a neutral artifact that acts as the [crowning](/wiki/Crowning "Crowning") gift for neutral female [drow](/wiki/Drow_\(starting_race\) "Drow (starting race)") [Nobles](/wiki/Noble "Noble"), [Priests](/wiki/Priest "Priest"), [Rangers](/wiki/Ranger "Ranger"), [Rogues](/wiki/Rogue "Rogue"), and [Wizards](/wiki/Wizard "Wizard"). The Claws of the Revenancer are made of silver and have several effects related to [life draining](/wiki/Life_drain "Life drain") and [undead](/wiki/Undead "Undead").

### EvilHack

In [EvilHack](/wiki/EvilHack "EvilHack"), a character's dexterity confers bonuses to AC while unburdened in a manner somewhat similar to SLASH'EM, making gauntlets of dexterity more desirable (though not to the same extent).

Gauntlets of dexterity are generated as part of various kits for player monsters, including [centaurs](/index.php?title=Centaur_\(monster_attribute\)\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "Centaur (monster attribute) (page does not exist)") in several roles and [monks](/wiki/Monk_\(player_monster\) "Monk (player monster)") of all races.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to SLASH'EM details, [The Pickpocket's Gloves](/wiki/The_Pickpocket%27s_Gloves "The Pickpocket's Gloves") are a pair of [chaotic](/wiki/Chaotic "Chaotic") artifact gauntlets of dexterity: they confer [stealth](/wiki/Stealth "Stealth") and [automatic searching](/wiki/Automatic_searching "Automatic searching") while worn, and additionally provide a +20 bonus to stealing from monsters via the [borrow](/wiki/Borrow "Borrow") [extended command](/wiki/Extended_command "Extended command").

### Hack'EM

In [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM"), upgrading gauntlets of dexterity will produce [gauntlets of fumbling](/wiki/Gauntlets_of_fumbling "Gauntlets of fumbling") and vice versa - all EvilHack details apply.

## 引用及注释

2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/mplayer.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 289](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mplayer.c#L289)

敏捷手套（gauntlets of dexterity，有时缩写为GoD）是NetHack中的一种手套类防具。它是一种魔法防具，由皮革制成，未鉴定时外观是随机的[1]。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述

生成

在星界位面生成的玩家怪物若生成时未获得战锤，则有7⁄8的概率获得一双随机手套，该手套有1⁄5的概率是敏捷手套，因此这些玩家怪物生成时有7⁄40（约17.5%）的概率获得敏捷手套[2]。

描述

敏捷手套的基础AC加成为1，并会根据自身的附魔等级赋予穿戴者等值的敏捷修正（最多可以将敏捷提升至25）。穿戴附魔值不为0的敏捷手套会自动鉴定之。

策略

高敏捷值可以增加玩家的攻击和法术命中敌人的概率，不过，能够提升命中的手段很多（例如提升武器技能和幸运值）。因此，敏捷手套的使用频率并不高，在飞升套件里用皮手套也足够了。施法玩家可以使用敏捷手套来提升攻击法术（例如魔法飞弹和死亡一指）的命中率。僧侣也可以用它缓解穿戴铠甲带来的命中惩罚。

该手套也可以增加投掷鸡蛇蛋或麻痹药水等非武器类物品的命中率，这些道具只能通过提升敏捷增加命中率——然而，即使你的敏捷提升到23点，投掷这些道具仍有约12%的概率不命中。如果你可以接受风险的话，持握这些道具并近战攻击敌人会更容易生效。

历史

敏捷手套最初于NetHack 3.0.0加入游戏。

Variants

您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

In SLASH'EM, upgrading leather gloves has a 1⁄2 chance of producing gauntlets of dexterity, and upgrading gauntlets of dexterity always produces leather gloves.

The Gauntlets of Defense are a neutral pair of artifact gauntlets of dexterity that provide half physical damage while worn, and can be invoked to toggle invisibility.

Dexterity improves your AC at higher values, making gauntlets of dexterity much more attractive to the point that they may feature in ascension kits. It is debatable whether they are worth spending a wish on, since they are much more available through mundane means, especially for gnomish characters who have the ability to tinker.

NetHack brass

In NetHack brass, gauntlets of dexterity set the wearer's dexterity to their race or role's maximum similar to gauntlets of power, and they will always auto-identify when worn or removed.

dNetHack

In dNetHack and notdNetHack, gauntlets of dexterity confer 2 base AC, 0 base DR and add their enchantment to the wearer's dexterity while worn. Both variants also incorporate SLASH'EM-styled bonuses to AC.

Female droven Anachrononauts start with a +1 pair of gauntlets of dexterity.

dNetHack has two pairs of artifact gauntlets of dexterity:

  • The Shield of the Resolute Heart, an unaligned artifact that can be enchanted to +7 - they confer half physical damage when worn, and can be invoked to bless and repair themselves, also raising the enchantment to +3 if it is below that threshold.
  • The Claws of the Revenancer, a neutral artifact that acts as the crowning gift for neutral female drow Nobles, Priests, Rangers, Rogues, and Wizards. The Claws of the Revenancer are made of silver and have several effects related to life draining and undead.

EvilHack

In EvilHack, a character's dexterity confers bonuses to AC while unburdened in a manner somewhat similar to SLASH'EM, making gauntlets of dexterity more desirable (though not to the same extent).

Gauntlets of dexterity are generated as part of various kits for player monsters, including centaurs in several roles and monks of all races.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to SLASH'EM details, The Pickpocket's Gloves are a pair of chaotic artifact gauntlets of dexterity: they confer stealth and automatic searching while worn, and additionally provide a +20 bonus to stealing from monsters via the borrow extended command.

Hack'EM

In Hack'EM, upgrading gauntlets of dexterity will produce gauntlets of fumbling and vice versa - all EvilHack details apply.

|cost=50 |weight=10 |material=皮革 }} '''敏捷手套'''（gauntlets of dexterity，有时缩写为'''GoD'''）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[手套]]类[[防具]]。它是一种[[魔法物品|魔法]]防具，由[[皮革]]制成，未[[鉴定]]时外观是[[随机外观|随机]]的{{refsrc|src/objects.c|497|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 生成 == 在[[星界位面]]生成的[[玩家怪物]]若生成时未获得[[战锤]]，则有{{frac|7|8}}的概率[[怪物起始物品|获得]]一双随机手套，该手套有{{frac|5}}的概率是敏捷手套，因此这些玩家怪物生成时有{{frac|7|40}}（约17.5%）的概率获得敏捷手套{{refsrc|src/mplayer.c|289|version=NetHack 3.6.7}}。 == 描述 == 敏捷手套的基础{{cnlink|AC}}加成为1，并会根据自身的[[附魔]]等级赋予穿戴者等值的[[敏捷]]修正（最多可以将敏捷提升至25）。穿戴附魔值不为0的敏捷手套会[[自动鉴定]]之。 == 策略 == 高敏捷值可以增加玩家的攻击和法术命中敌人的概率，不过，能够提升[[命中]]的手段很多（例如提升武器[[技能]]和[[幸运]]值）。因此，敏捷手套的使用频率并不高，在[[飞升套件]]里用[[皮手套]]也足够了。施法玩家可以使用敏捷手套来提升[[攻击法术]]（例如{{+ of/zh-CN|魔法飞弹}}和{{+ of/zh-CN|死亡一指}}）的命中率。[[僧侣]]也可以用它缓解穿戴[[铠甲]]带来的[[命中]]惩罚。 该手套也可以增加[[投掷]][[鸡蛇蛋]]或[[麻痹药水]]等非武器类物品的命中率，这些道具只能通过提升敏捷增加命中率——然而，即使你的敏捷提升到23点，投掷这些道具仍有约12%的概率不命中。如果你可以接受风险的话，[[持握]]这些道具并近战攻击敌人会更容易生效。 == 历史 == 敏捷手套最初于[[NetHack 3.0.0]]加入游戏。 ==Variants== {{translation/zh-CN|n}} ===SLASH'EM=== In [[SLASH'EM]], [[upgrading]] leather gloves has a {{frac|2}} chance of producing gauntlets of dexterity, and upgrading gauntlets of dexterity always produces leather gloves. [[The Gauntlets of Defense]] are a [[neutral]] pair of [[artifact]] gauntlets of dexterity that provide [[half physical damage]] while worn, and can be [[invoked]] to toggle [[invisibility]]. Dexterity improves your AC at higher values, making gauntlets of dexterity much more attractive to the point that they may feature in ascension kits. It is debatable whether they are worth spending a [[wish]] on, since they are much more available through mundane means, especially for [[Gnome (starting race)|gnomish]] characters who have the ability to [[tinker]]. ===NetHack brass=== In [[NetHack brass]], gauntlets of dexterity set the wearer's dexterity to their race or role's maximum similar to [[gauntlets of power]], and they will always auto-identify when worn or removed. ===dNetHack=== In [[dNetHack]] and [[notdNetHack]], gauntlets of dexterity confer 2 base AC, 0 base [[DR]] and add their enchantment to the wearer's dexterity while worn. Both variants also incorporate SLASH'EM-styled bonuses to AC. Female [[Drow (starting race)|droven]] [[Anachrononaut]]s start with a +1 pair of gauntlets of dexterity. dNetHack has two pairs of artifact gauntlets of dexterity: * [[dNetHack artifacts#Shield of the Resolute Heart|The Shield of the Resolute Heart]], an unaligned artifact that can be enchanted to +7 - they confer half physical damage when worn, and can be invoked to bless and repair themselves, also raising the enchantment to +3 if it is below that threshold. * [[dNetHack artifacts#The Claws of the Revenancer|The Claws of the Revenancer]], a neutral artifact that acts as the [[crowning]] gift for neutral female [[Drow (starting race)|drow]] [[Noble]]s, [[Priest]]s, [[Ranger]]s, [[Rogue]]s, and [[Wizard]]s. The Claws of the Revenancer are made of silver and have several effects related to [[life drain]]ing and [[undead]]. ===EvilHack=== In [[EvilHack]], a character's dexterity confers bonuses to AC while unburdened in a manner somewhat similar to SLASH'EM, making gauntlets of dexterity more desirable (though not to the same extent). Gauntlets of dexterity are generated as part of various kits for player monsters, including [[Centaur (monster attribute)|centaurs]] in several roles and [[Monk (player monster)|monks]] of all races. ===SlashTHEM=== In [[SlashTHEM]], in addition to SLASH'EM details, [[The Pickpocket's Gloves]] are a pair of [[chaotic]] artifact gauntlets of dexterity: they confer [[stealth]] and [[automatic searching]] while worn, and additionally provide a +20 bonus to stealing from monsters via the [[borrow]] [[extended command]]. ===Hack'EM=== In [[Hack'EM]], upgrading gauntlets of dexterity will produce [[gauntlets of fumbling]] and vice versa - all EvilHack details apply. == 引用及注释 == {{nethack-367/zh-CN}} [[Category:Gloves/zh-CN|MINJIESHOUTAO]]
